data.text: @khaleejtimes Stop this madness. People are now afraid to come back to the mosques even after taking the injection.
@khaleejtimes Very good decision. I am appreciate this decision

@abdullah_saheel @khaleejtimes Yes this should be. You can't change allah rules for a men made mistake. Masjid shouldn't be closed then also,  you can allow one person or two person pray because masjid can't be kept closed all the time.
@khaleejtimes Alhamdulillah 🤲 soon we are back to normal
@Neemuchwala @khaleejtimes Im praying home till the rules came! May allah accept my prayers and forgive my sins
@khaleejtimes Nonsense. This is worst social distancing. How can namaz be accepted.

@khaleejtimes @Abramjee Such fools.
Do they have the one metre devil's distancing on their airplanes and their dens of vice?
